Ajeshkumar C.
Founder & CTO at DXB Apps- Blockchain l NFT | IoT | ML | AI | E-commerce | Web and Mobile app development | Big Data | Augment Reality | OTT development |

About
About
Highly experienced professional with expertise in blockchain technology, mobile app development, and AI solutions.

Founder and CTO of DXB APPS - D X Technologies LLC, a digital innovation agency specializing in mobile application solutions, blockchain, AI, machine learning, generative text AI, and IoT.

Chief Blockchain Officer for Blockchain Africa Network, driving blockchain initiatives and fostering innovation in the African market.

Co-Founder and CTO of Saudi Blockchain and Emirates Blockchain Holdings, shaping the strategic direction and delivering top-notch blockchain services.

Co-Founder and Managing Director of ABU DHABI APPS - OILX TECHNOLOGIES, leading a consultancy firm providing enterprise-grade solutions and services through emerging technologies.

Previous positions include Executive Director of Technology at DX BUSINESS GROUP LTD and Founder and CEO of A2 Solutions FZC, excelling in web design, web development, and software solutions.
Proven track record of success, impressive tech skills, and a commitment to delivering exceptional results.

Passionate about turning business ideas into successful legacies and helping businesses achieve unparalleled growth and success.

Connect on LinkedIn for collaboration opportunities and stay updated on advancements in blockchain, mobile app development, and AI solutions.

Have a concept but uncertain about bringing it to life? Discover DxB Apps – your ultimate destination for creating cutting-edge mobile apps. Benefit from our globally recognized, fast-to-market solutions with a proven track record. Request a complimentary demo now at www.dxbapps.com.

Post
Post
Reflecting on the first month of 2024, as the founder and CTO of DXB Apps, has been an exciting journey. At DXB Apps, we get to meet new clients every day and hear their cool ideas for mobile apps in various areas. It's awesome to chat with new people all the time and get fresh perspectives on stuff that's already out there.

January 2024 has been buzzing with new ideas thanks to everyone's New Year's resolutions, and we can't wait to see what's next. At DXB Apps, we don't just make stuff; we help our clients figure out what's important to them. We think hard about every project before we dive in, ensuring our solutions hit the mark for our clients.

If you're in Dubai, let's grab coffee and chat. We're excited to hear your ideas and see how DXB Apps can make them happen.
